sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"使人娱乐，消遣"之意。
means: amuse ：指使人通过注意某些有趣或悦人的事物而消遣，着重使人愉快的效果。
entertain ：指通过给他人快乐感的消遣活动，使自己或他人从单调中解脱出来。
interest ：普通用词，指出于任何原因使人兴奋或对某事物保持好奇心或注意力，侧重引起兴趣或注意。
please ：多指愿望、兴趣得到满足后产生的强烈满意情绪。

sentence.Network_en: Their antics never fail to amuse.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们滑稽的举止总是让人发笑。

sentence.Network_en: He could amuse us for hours with his stories of the theater.
sentence.Network_cn: 他能接连几小时地为我们讲戏剧故事逗我们发笑.

sentence.Network_en: Tom makes up stories to amuse his little brother.
sentence.Network_cn: 汤姆编故事逗他的小弟弟.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 初中英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... among prep. 在 … 中间；在（三个以上）之间 amuse vt. （使人）快乐，逗乐 ancient a. 古代的，古老的.

list.abs: 商务英语词汇大全_外语教育网 ... fair 市场 amusement park 游乐园 ghost train 魔鬼列车.
... 1. space museum 太空博物院 2. amusement park 游乐场 3. water park 水上乐园.
建筑专业英语名词 - 豆丁网 ... amplitude of vibration 振幅 amusement center 娱乐中心 amusement park 公共游乐场.
原因非常简单:为了逃避娱乐税(Amusement Tax)的缴纳。这一税收始于魏玛共和国时期。当时,如果在放映一部未经电影审查委员会定级的故事片之前加映一部已经评级的.
从零开始学语法：一起来学反身代词_英语网 ... for oneself 替自己 amuse oneself 自娱自乐 help oneself to 随便吃.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the sense 'delude, deceive'): from Old French amuser 'entertain, deceive', from a- (expressing causal effect) + muser 'stare stupidly'. Current senses date from the mid 17th cent

encyclopedia.content: Amuse简介 Amuse与HORIPRO同为演艺界少数上市事务所。以作为上市公司的Amuse为主体，还包括专门制作音乐软件的TASHITA LABELMUSIC和制作、销售影像软件的AMUSE ENTERTAINMENT。 创立于1978年的Amuse拥有员工198人（集团员工数264人），是业界老牌大型事务所之一。在Amuse大股东中，个人持股数第一名是创始人大里洋吉、第四名大里久仁子、第七名是前会长宫下昌之，第十位则是CCC（TSUTAYA）会长増田宗昭。 创始人大里洋吉原为渡边

entry.def: If something amuses you, it makes you want to laugh or smile.

example.ex: The thought seemed to amuse him...
example.tran: 这种想法好像把他逗乐了。

example.ex: Their antics never fail to amuse.
example.tran: 他们滑稽的举止总是让人发笑。

entry.def: If you amuse yourself, you do something in order to pass the time and not become bored.

example.ex: I need distractions. I need to amuse myself so I won't keep thinking about things...
example.tran: 我需要分散我的注意力。需要消遣一下，让自己不去想这样那样的事。

example.ex: Put a selection of baby toys in his cot to amuse him if he wakes early.
example.tran: 要在婴儿床里放一些玩具，以便他醒得早时可以自己玩。

means.word_mean: 1. occupy in an agreeable, entertaining or pleasant fashion;

auth_sentence.content: These unique works of art still startle and amuse.
auth_sentence.res_content: These unique works of art still startle and amuse.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These unique works of art still startle and amuse.

auth_sentence.content: He likes to amuse, provoke and unsettle his audience.
auth_sentence.res_content: He likes to amuse, provoke and unsettle his audience.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He likes to amuse, provoke and unsettle his audience.

stems_affixes.word_buile: amuse娱乐+ment表名词→n.娱乐,消遣,乐趣
muse文艺音乐,娱乐等+um场所→n.博物馆,展览馆

stems_affixes.value_cn: 向……提供娱乐,使……消遣;引人发笑

Sentence.sentence: LOL has evolved into something much subtler and sophisticated and is used even when nothing is remotely amusing.
Similarly, those who are able to view the world with amused tolerance are often equally forgiving of their own shortcomings.

sentences.en: His jokes amused the crying child.
sentences.cn: 他的笑话逗笑了那个正在哭闹的孩子。

sentences.en: How do you amuse yourself in rainy weather?

jushi.english: That kind of joke doesn't amuse me.
jushi.chinese: 那种笑话没法逗我发笑。

jushi.english: I was amused to see her trying to please the boss.
jushi.chinese: 看见她讨好老板，我觉得好笑。

jushi.english: We had to keep thinking of things to amuse Haff.
jushi.chinese: 我们得不断地想法子让哈夫笑。
